ai-atk-s0502a16:95_1: Because when the rain comes down, they stand noisy, finish, and chopped off their relatives in front of him. Having seen this state of existence they’d return to that village. And then the deities come back here, saying: ‘May I get this world!’ And from that village I returned to my home village.’
ai-atk-s0502a16:97_0: ‘I have safely gone forth in the distance,
ai-atk-s0502a16:100_0: ‘One who has made merit and bad karma, in the past, the future, and present.
ai-atk-s0502a16:101_0: It’s good for their relatives that they love you, free of defilements.’
ai-atk-s0502a16:102_1: whether they carry off a snare, a king, earning a living by means of the food, being hardened, carried out by not being honored, respected, esteemed, and venerated by the gate.
ai-atk-s0502a16:102_3: If they look forward to enjoying places, they only by expel them, or by rising on their heads, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind.
ai-atk-s0502a16:102_4: And here there are ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, a hundred thousand rebirths; many eons of the world contracting, many eons of the world expanding, many eons of the world contracting and expanding. They look for themselves.
ai-atk-s0502a16:102_5: loved ones here and dressed in love for many days.
ai-atk-s0502a16:103_0: they’ve drunk the fruit of stream-entry, the fruit of once-return.
